channel.title: About Me on Bogdan's portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on Bogdan's portfolio

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to my portfolio page! I am a software engineer with a passion for creating all kinds of different software. Take a look around my page to see some of the projects I have worked on. You can find a short, compact list in my CV, or a more detailed list in the Projects section. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to work together on a project. dopisao sam ovo
